A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The script is really only a bit above adequate in this film. Humor attempt was awkward\, ill placed and political sub themes were so flipping annoying. It's like a virus in films we can't get rid of now. What bothered me most was Luke looking like he'd been hitting the bottle a bit too much atop his retreat. There was one scene I loved where Luke got excited to see R2 and it was great watching him again. Then he sunk into this deep voice that drove me nuts - yeah\, he was old but old Ben still looked sober at least. I think most people agree you CAN follow up a great film with a great film (Empire Strikes Back) but it clearly didn't happen here. Who approves these final cuts of the film is what I want to know and why would they do this after such a great film like the Force Awakens?
